description: Try our easy to follow Mussels In Beer With Crusty Bread recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mussels In Beer With Crusty Bread
name: Mussels In Beer With Crusty Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in beer and bring to a simmer. Add mussels and cover pot. Cook, stirring twice, for 5-10 minutes or until mussels have opened. Transfer mussels to a large serving bowl. Cover to keep warm. Bring pan juices to the boil. Whisk in butter, parsley and mustard. Pour over mussels. Serve with bread.
